```{r}
#| label: r_setup
#| include: false
library(reticulate)
library(DT)

if(Sys.getenv("GITHUB_ACTIONS") == ""){
  use_virtualenv("r-arrow-dash")
}

update_time <- format(Sys.time(), "%a %b %d %X %Y %z")

dt_show_buttons <- function(x){
  
  DT::datatable(
    x,
    escape = FALSE,
    extensions = 'Buttons',
    options = list(
      dom = 'Bfrtip',
      buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel')
    )
  )
}
```
